channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s border-czar takeover does little to calm Minneapolis tensions: ‘The agenda is still the same’
item.description: Experts say Tom Homan’s charge, replacing Greg Bovino’s aggressive tactics, may change the tone, but not the mission In his clearest attempt yet to “d...

item.title: First Thing: Minnesota girl, 10, released from ICE custody after a month in detention
item.description: Elizabeth Caisaguano and her mother released from Texas facility hit by measles outbreak. Plus, the Epstein stories you may have missed Good morning. ...

item.title: Ukraine, Russia agree to exchange prisoners after ‘productive’ talks with US - Europe live
item.description: US special envoy Steve Witkoff said that the countries agreed to exchange 314 prisoners, with talks to continue in coming weeks US presidential envoy ...

item.title: Calls to shut down Texas ICE facility for children grow amid measles outbreak
item.description: At least two cases confirmed at detention center for children and their parents in Texas At least two cases of measles have been confirmed at a major ...

item.title: Keir Starmer ‘sorry for having believed Mandelson’s lies’ about his relationship with Epstein – UK politics live
item.description: Pressure continues to build on the prime minister after he said he knew about Mandelson’s friendship with Epstein before his appointment as US ambassa...

item.title: UK's £8bn research fund faces 'hard decisions' as it pauses new grants
item.description: UKRI boss Ian Chapman said it had been told by the government to "focus and do fewer things better".

item.title: US must be prudent when supplying arms to Taiwan, Xi tells Trump
item.description: Their call comes in the wake of a flurry of visits by Western leaders to China in recent months.

item.title: 55,000 Ukrainian soldiers killed in war with Russia, Zelensky says
item.description: The Ukrainian president also said a large number of people were "officially missing", meaning the total death toll is thought to be much higher.

item.title: Cargo ship captain jailed for six years over deadly North Sea tanker crash
item.description: Vladimir Motin is sentenced after a crew member died in the crash between a cargo ship and tanker.

item.title: Deaths of at least 30 in UK's worst small boat disaster were avoidable, inquiry finds
item.description: Inquiry chair Sir Ross Cranston said "systemic failures" by authorities had led to the deadliest Channel small boat incident on record.
